entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump What we need to PROTEST NEXT is America loosing tens of thousands of extra lives, in part, because Trump initially inferred to virus as a hoax & therefore governments (federal & local) didn't treat it seriously for weeks. THIS CAN'T BE OVERLOOKED. 
https://t.co/IFzISZ8dfN
